introduction: SYNOPSISManaging director of Samjin Group, Hyung-oh is not worried about his wife finding out about relations between him and his secretary Myung-hwa. He credits his wife's personality as the basis of his lack of concern. His wife Hae-kyung does indeed suspect them and she tries to talk Myung-hwa into backing off. Myung-hwa leaves Hyung-oh and marries Sung-ki who runs a ranch on Jeju Island. But she finds out that she is pregnant with Hyung-oh's child and they promise to reunite a year later. Sung-ki tries to convince her to stay by attempting suicide but her mind is made up. Myung-hwa returns to Seoul to reunite with Hyung-oh, but this time Hae-kyung is not about to back down without a fight.故事集团管理横杠来不知疲倦关系书记绘画和通奸，不关心，认为自然也没什么大不了的cover.What妻子。Hyegyeong不是猜测，两人的关系达到另一次访问的杰作。这些画被分离并hyeongoh结婚，阴部济州岛一个牧场。但怀孕hyeongoh绘画的孩子还会再见面爬形状，两个人都承诺一年后重逢。同时，让我们自杀企图抓住阴茎的心是不是真正的绝世名画决定离婚。绘画是抱着充气梦想来到首尔只是在等待老团聚，不允许在在改变形式，两个人的前部hyeongoh hyegyeong。
